header_text: You are walking to an important meeting with your supervisor. Suddenly your mind goes blank as you reach for the doorknob to her office. You think about your mind going blank and think that this is normal.

elements.Text: Is it scary that your mind went blank right before your meeting?

elements.name: You are walking to an important meeting with your supervisor. Suddenly your mind goes blank as you reach for the doorknob to her office. You think about your mind going blank and think that this is normal._Work/Career Development_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
